description:
Course Updated 22 January 2016

Why are 16,560 students wanting me to mentor them in 37 Udemy courses? 16,560 students have started learning from me since August 7th 2015. Shouldn't you find out why?

Are you wanting to get some experience with Microsoft Excel 2013? Does it seem quite difficult to use?

In this course you will start from the absolute basics to create a spreadsheet with some simple functions and a lovely look and feel.

You will be able to learn how to open, save and close Excel files and know how to save the files in a spot you can find files in easily.

Then you will be given a tour of the overall Excel 2013 landscape and menu ribbons. You will learn how Excel 2013 has a fantastic menu command structure and how all the functions are grouped together in a very orderly fashion.

You will discover how to:

  • Add and edit data
  • Format text
  • Add borders and manipulate colors
  • Use AutoFill to populate your spreadsheet
  • Use Formulas like addition, subtraction and Sum Totals

All this will be done from scratch and you will see a completed spreadsheet at the end for an example Dry Cleaning business.

After this course, you will be quite familiar with some of the basics of using Microsoft Excel 2013.

Enroll today and start learning
title: Excel 2013 Beginners Guide  - Build A Business Spreadsheet
